0.name: The Voice
0.text: Oh, it's you, well how are you doing?

1.name: The Voice
1.text: Sorry, forgot that you can't speak

2.name: The Voice
2.text: Anyway, are you still stuck in the cave?

3.name: The Voice
3.text: Ah, damn dumb me, sorry I forgot again that you can't speak it was a long time since I talked to some one

4.name: The Voice
4.text: The good thing is Gabe is still searching you Viktor

5.name: The Voice
5.text: You should try to search a way out of the cave
